titleStmt.title: Fiue sermons vpon speciall occasions (Viz.) 1. A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse. 2. To the Honorable the Virginia Company 3. At the consecration of Lincolnes Inne Chappell. 4. The first sermon preached to K. Charles at St. Iames, 1625. 5. A sermon preached to his Maiestie at White-hall, 24. Febr. 1625. By Iohn Donne Deane of Saint Pauls, London.
titleStmt.author: Donne, John, 1572-1631.
Donne, John, 1572-1631. Sermon upon the xx. verse of the v. chapter of the booke of Judges. aut
Donne, John, 1572-1631. Sermon upon the viii. verse of the I. chapter of the Acts of the Apostles. aut
Donne, John, 1572-1631. Encaenia. aut
Donne, John, 1572-1631. First sermon preached to King Charles, at Saint James. aut
Donne, John, 1572-1631. Sermon, preached to the Kings Mtie. at Whitehall, 24 Febr. 1625. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Iones, and are to bee sold at the signe of the Blacke Rauen in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: A reissue of: A sermon vpon the xx. verse of the v. chapter of the booke of Iudges (STC 7054, with A² cancelled by general title page) -- A sermon vpon the eighth verse of the first chapter of the Acts of the Apostles (STC 7052) -- Encænia -- The first sermon preached to King Charles, at Saint Iames -- A sermon, preached to the Kings Mtie. at Whitehall, 24 Febr. 1625.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
